intro.description:
Test Cases are reusable modules. They can contain references to other Test Cases, and can contain Test Steps.
The following steps show you how to create a Test Case.

item.title: Create a Test Case
item.description:
In the Test Case Browser, right-click on the Test Cases node and select:
New > New Test Case from the context-sensitive menu.
Enter Perform Addition as the Test Case name.
Click OK.
The Test Case you created appears in the Test Case Browser.
